data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Nii é loozu é zoloo guye wooi ma, nii daa ga: «Zunu loin ná-saai». Davide ná-guyei.
Nà Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ ga zìimaʋɛ pɛ,
Nà ɠoozunɛ è ʋɔ, gè ɠoozunɛ gola,
Siɛgi zu sìli nuiti ti ɠulazu la ʋolu,
Mazɔlɔɔ è màaloboga, è bà vai ɠaaɠula ba,
Ɗa ɓaazaɠazu zii ɠiligiti ma, è faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui undaaʋili,
Sili nu nɔpɛ ge la mɔ ná.
Kɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa sei wosu yeenɔpɛ,
Tɔ ɠa é zeini eteai unda ga telebodai,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛ ga siɠigi maanɔɠɔ nui ʋɛ kae,
Niiti ti è ɠwɛɛ, naati ti la è la.
À Siyɔn masagi Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI lɛbi ga guyeiti,
Mazɔlɔɔ toɠa ɗa ɲama ʋui ʋotokula, ki ge la ɠula su,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, màawɔinɠa!
nii a kɛ è maamusɛ wooi wo Zeluzalɛme taa ziɠidaʋɛti,
Zii ɠiligiti ta loozu zeɠei zu, nii ti bɔai ga ti-yeeiti,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɓɔɠɔ lɛɛzu, é sɔledai ɠɛ.
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti, ta zii ɠiligiti, ti la yiizoolɛzu ga GALA ná-faa,
Kɛlɛ GALA ge la yeema pɛ maanɔɠɔ nuiti ma, eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Wuzeɠe, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nui mina pilɛ sɔlɔɔ!
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, dualuagi lɔ ti zu!
